snippet: The French pianist Lise de la Salle opened the Peoples’ Symphony Concerts series at Washington Irving High School on Saturday night.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews performance by French pianist Lise de la Salle at Washington Irving High School as part of Peoples' Symphony Concerts series.
lead_paragraph: The French pianist Lise de la Salle opened the Peoples’ Symphony Concerts series at Washington Irving High School on Saturday night.

headline.seo: Lise de la Salle, a French Pianist, Opens Concert Series
headline.main: A Twirling Airiness in a Recital of Schumann, Bach and Debussy
headline.print_headline: A Twirling Airiness in a Recital of Schumann, Bach and Debussy
